parameter.value: Hi |PLAYERNAME|. How can I help you?
I also need to make a living...
I can tell you something about quests, if you buy a scythe from me and start to cut in the fields to the west, you will find something.
I can give you a bread guide?
I can sell you a Scythe?

First of all you need a scythe. Cut some wheat, the use it on a millstone and you have produced flour. Combine the floor with water and you\'ll get a lump of dough. Find an oven and you made yourself some bread! Easy, isn\'t it?
